source_objects.title: Marketing Fundamentals
source_objects.description: Need to learn marketing? Start with courese that introduce you to market research, marketing fundementals and more.

items.title: How to Create a Website that Converts
items.headline: Using S.M.A.R.T Objectives, Personas and Wireframes
objectives_summary: Learn what makes a website suck.
My 5 Step Process for creating an effective website that converts.
Learn about personas.

items.title: Customer Journey Mapping: practical step-by-step workshop

visible_instructors.name: Giovanna
visible_instructors.title: Giovanna Toldi
visible_instructors.job_title: International business strategist and marketing expert

items.headline: Understand your customers | Unpack and map needs and expectations along their buying lifecycle | Excel on CX delivery
objectives_summary: In this highly practical workshop, I take you through a series of steps that will make you explore in depth who your customers are and what they want/expect to find across their buying journeys, so that you can address those needs and expectations and stand out from the competition. A customer journey map is an indispensable design thinking process and by the end of the workshop, you will have developed a detailed action plan that addresses your customers experience with your brand across their buying journey in a very crowded market. Please note: this is a spoken presentation and it requires the ability to listen to an instructor.

objectives_summary: The concept of market segmentation

The different types of segmentation in B2B markets

objectives_summary: What cripples your efforts in marketing, PR and sales.

items.headline: How your business; company; healthcare service or professional firm can gain better online customer reviews.
objectives_summary: Utilize simple techniques in order to earn better online reviews for their business.
Claim and confirm online profiles for their business.
Target the "Top 25" online review websites for their business.

items.title: The Best Use of Your Marketing Dollars
items.headline: Marketing can be confusing. In this course, you will learn which strategies to avoid and which to consider.
objectives_summary: Every year owners of small and growing businesses waste billions (that's with a "b") of marketing dollars, not knowing where or how to market. "The Best Use of your Marketing Dollars" provides clear marketing directions for business owners.
Will provide clear marketing directions for business owners
You will achieve results quickly, and gain a bigger and faster bang for your marketing expenditures.

items.title: Must-Know Marketing Fundamentals For Business Success
items.headline: The Ultimate Guide to Marketing Essentials That Grow Your Business and Income
objectives_summary: Understand how the world's top companies use fundamental marketing principles to generate revenue
Discover how to make smart business decisions that grow profit in the long-term
Leverage key marketing fundamentals to build success as a business owner or employee
